Keywords: Cosmic , Phoenix Force , Shi'ar , Starjammers , Warrior , X-Men
Real Name: Korvus Rook'Shir
Special Powers
BLADE OF THE PHOENIX: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Korvus Rook'Shir uses it, apply the following effect based on the d6 result. 1-3: The attack deals penetrating damage. 4-6: Once per turn after resolutions, Korvus Rook'Shir may make a close attack.

Goop
Ah yes you are correct. He loses that power when he gains flurry. Overall though he's still a solid piece for only 50pts. With that special power no matter what you roll with blades its still a nasty hit.
August 21, 2021
Bat-Phreak
Unless the Units section is incorrect, the extra attack is only available with his Attack SP which does not overlap with Flurry.
August 12, 2021
Goop
For 50 pts this guy can bring a lot of damage. With the extra attack trait he's swinging 3 times on those later clicks with flurry. He's not a game breaking piece but for 50pts he can do a lot and is tough to kill with that high value CR. Especially if you have him Masterminding dmg to Ch'od also.
